TestCase.name: testRemoveCollation_Aggregate
TestCase.Resource: WITH r AS (SELECT * FROM x, y WHERE a = d AND c LIKE 'He%') SELECT sum(b) FROM r group by a

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$0=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), LIKE($2, 'He%'))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[y, source: [selectedFields=[d, e, f]]]])

Calc(select=[EXPR$0]) +- SortAggregate(isMerge=[false], groupBy=[a], select=[a, SUM(b) AS EXPR$0]) +- Calc(select=[a, b]) +- SortMergeJoin(where=[=(a, d)], join=[a, b, d], joinType=[InnerJoin]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a, b], where=[LIKE(c, 'He%')], outputBinaryRow=[true]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[y, source: [selectedFields=[d]]]], fields=[d])

TestCase.name: testRemoveCollation_Aggregate_1
TestCase.Resource: WITH r AS (SELECT * FROM x, y WHERE a = d AND c LIKE 'He%') SELECT sum(b) FROM r group by d

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$0=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$3], b=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), LIKE($2, 'He%'))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[y, source: [selectedFields=[d, e, f]]]])

Calc(select=[EXPR$0]) +- SortAggregate(isMerge=[false], groupBy=[d], select=[d, SUM(b) AS EXPR$0]) +- Calc(select=[d, b]) +- SortMergeJoin(where=[=(a, d)], join=[a, b, d], joinType=[InnerJoin]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a, b], where=[LIKE(c, 'He%')], outputBinaryRow=[true]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[y, source: [selectedFields=[d]]]], fields=[d])

TestCase.name: testRemoveCollation_Aggregate_3
TestCase.Resource: WITH r AS (SELECT * FROM x ORDER BY a, b) SELECT a, b, COUNT(c) AS cnt FROM r GROUP BY a, b

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], cnt=[COUNT($2)]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], sort1=[$1], dir0=[ASC-nulls-first], dir1=[ASC-nulls-first]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]])

SortAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS cnt]) +- Sort(orderBy=[a ASC, b ASC]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) +- LocalSortAggregate(groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, Partial_COUNT(c) AS count$0]) +- Sort(orderBy=[a ASC, b ASC]) +- Exchange(distribution=[range[a ASC, b ASC]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testRemoveCollation_OverWindowAgg
TestCase.Resource: SELECT SUM(b) sum_b, AVG(SUM(b)) OVER (PARTITION BY a order by a) avg_b, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY a ORDER BY a) rn FROM x GROUP BY a

LogicalProject(sum_b=[$1], avg_b=[/(CAST(CASE(>(COUNT($1) OVER (PARTITION BY $0 ORDER BY $0 NULLS FIRST RANGE BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW), 0), CAST($SUM0($1) OVER (PARTITION BY $0 ORDER BY $0 NULLS FIRST RANGE BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)):BIGINT, null)):DOUBLE, COUNT($1) OVER (PARTITION BY $0 ORDER BY $0 NULLS FIRST RANGE BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW))], rn=[RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY $0 ORDER BY $0 NULLS FIRST RANGE BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], sum_b=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]])

Calc(select=[sum_b, /(CAST(CASE(>(w0$o0, 0), CAST(w0$o1), null)), w0$o0) AS avg_b, w0$o2 AS rn]) +- OverAggregate(partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[a ASC], window#0=[COUNT(sum_b) AS w0$o0, $SUM0(sum_b) AS w0$o1, RANK(*) AS w0$o2 RANG BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW], window#1=[ RANG BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW], select=[a, sum_b, w0$o0, w0$o1, w0$o2]) +- SortAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a], select=[a, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS sum_b]) +- Sort(orderBy=[a ASC]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- LocalSortAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, Partial_SUM(b) AS sum$0]) +- Sort(orderBy=[a ASC]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b]]]], fields=[a, b])

TestCase.name: testRemoveCollation_Sort
TestCase.Resource: WITH r AS (SELECT a, b, COUNT(c) AS cnt FROM x GROUP BY a, b) SELECT * FROM r ORDER BY a

LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], dir0=[ASC-nulls-first]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], cnt=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], cnt=[COUNT($2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]])

Sort(orderBy=[a ASC]) +- Exchange(distribution=[range[a ASC]]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS cnt]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, Partial_COUNT(c) AS count$0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testRemoveCollation_Rank_1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, SUM(b) FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a, b, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY a ORDER BY b) rk FROM x) WHERE rk <= 10 ) GROUP BY a

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], rk=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<=($2, 10)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], rk=[RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY $0 ORDER BY $1 NULLS FIRST RANGE BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]])

SortAggregate(isMerge=[false], groupBy=[a], select=[a, SUM(b) AS EXPR$1]) +- Rank(rankFunction=[RANK], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[b ASC], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=10], global=[true], select=[a, b]) +- Sort(orderBy=[a ASC, b ASC]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- Rank(rankFunction=[RANK], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[b ASC], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=10], global=[false], select=[a, b]) +- Sort(orderBy=[a ASC, b ASC]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b]]]], fields=[a, b])

TestCase.name: testRemoveCollation_Rank_2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b, MAX(c) FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a, b, c, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY a ORDER BY b) rk FROM x) WHERE rk <= 10 ) GROUP BY a, b

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], EXPR$2=[MAX($2)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], rk=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<=($3, 10)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], rk=[RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY $0 ORDER BY $1 NULLS FIRST RANGE BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]])

SortAggregate(isMerge=[false], groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, MAX(c) AS EXPR$2]) +- Rank(rankFunction=[RANK], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[b ASC], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=10], global=[true], select=[a, b, c]) +- Sort(orderBy=[a ASC, b ASC]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- Rank(rankFunction=[RANK], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[b ASC], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=10], global=[false], select=[a, b, c]) +- Sort(orderBy=[a ASC, b ASC]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testRemoveCollation_Rank_3
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], rk=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<=($3, 10)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], rk=[RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY $0 ORDER BY $1 NULLS FIRST RANGE BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], sort1=[$1], dir0=[ASC-nulls-first], dir1=[ASC-nulls-first]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]])

Sort(orderBy=[a ASC, b ASC]) +- Rank(rankFunction=[RANK], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[b ASC], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=10], global=[true], select=[a, b, c, rk]) +- Sort(orderBy=[a ASC, b ASC]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- Rank(rankFunction=[RANK], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[b ASC], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=10], global=[false], select=[a, b, c]) +- SortLimit(orderBy=[a ASC, b ASC], offset=[0], limit=[200], global=[true]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- SortLimit(orderBy=[a ASC, b ASC], offset=[0], limit=[200], global=[false]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testRemoveCollation_Rank_4
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$1], rk=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<=($2, 10)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$1], rk=[RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY $0 ORDER BY $0 NULLS FIRST RANGE BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], c=[COUNT($1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]])

Rank(rankFunction=[RANK], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[a ASC], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=10], global=[true], select=[a, c, rk]) +- SortAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a], select=[a, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS c]) +- Sort(orderBy=[a ASC]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- LocalSortAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, Partial_COUNT(c) AS count$0]) +- Sort(orderBy=[a ASC]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, c]]]], fields=[a, c])

TestCase.name: testRemoveCollation_Rank_Singleton
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(a), SUM(b) FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a, b, RANK() OVER(ORDER BY b) rk FROM x) WHERE rk <= 10 )

LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($0)], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], rk=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<=($2, 10)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], rk=[RANK() OVER (ORDER BY $1 NULLS FIRST RANGE BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]])

SortAggregate(isMerge=[false], select=[COUNT(a) AS EXPR$0, SUM(b) AS EXPR$1]) +- Rank(rankFunction=[RANK], partitionBy=[], orderBy=[b ASC], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=10], global=[true], select=[a, b]) +- Sort(orderBy=[b ASC]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- Rank(rankFunction=[RANK], partitionBy=[], orderBy=[b ASC], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=10], global=[false], select=[a, b]) +- Sort(orderBy=[b ASC]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b]]]], fields=[a, b])
